thread.title: STEPHEN MANGIAMELI
thread.title_full: Nebraska Furniture Mart reviewed by STEPHEN MANGIAMELI

author: STEPHEN MANGIAMELI
title: STEPHEN MANGIAMELI
text:
I've been purchasing furniture, appliances, and electronics from NFM for years without any issues. I've returned a few things without hassle and even called to get better financing terms when the terms changed the next day on new purchases. NFM associates have always been friendly, helpful and accommodating
NFM's prices are decent online, beat usually by only a few dollars by Amazon. But even then, NFM is constantly adjusting prices to stay competitive. If you have the ability to go into the store, the deals are usually even better and they offer steep discounts on clearance and open box items with the same warranties!
Would I recommend NFM? Most definitely!
